name: Boris Clicker
description:
This is a game about the UK prime minister, Boris Jhonson and it is all about funny things that Boris has done in the past or parodies about Boris.

The Game is an idle game and has about an 1hr and 30mins content in it.

The game is not intended to be offensive in any way and is all about making a joke.

Any advice or opinions on this game would be greatly appreciated.
